inventory.noSkillsAssigned: No skills assigned to skill bar.
inventory.itemCannotEquipConsumableBar: This item cannot be equipped to the consumable bar.
inventory.onlyCombatConsumables: Only healing potions, mana potions, and buff items can be equipped to the consumable bar.
inventory.consumableBarFull: Consumable bar is full ({{slots}} slots). Remove an item first.

combat.levelUp: Level up! You are now level {{level}}!
combat.levelUpMultiple: Level up! You gained {{levels}} levels! You are now level {{newLevel}}!
combat.failedToStart: Failed to start combat. Please try again.
combat.idleMessage: Idle - Select a dungeon to begin combat
combat.idleHint: Choose a dungeon from the list below and click "Start Combat"

turnOrder.title: Turn Order
turnOrder.description: Combat is turn-based, with participants acting in order based on their Speed stat.
turnOrder.fasterFirst: If two participants have the same Speed, the order is random
turnOrder.roundBased: All participants take one turn per round

damage.title: Damage Calculation
damage.description: Physical damage is calculated using the following formula:
damage.explanation: Higher Defense reduces damage taken, but with diminishing returns. For example, 100 Defense reduces damage by 50%, while 200 Defense reduces damage by 66.7%.

defense.title: Defense & Damage Mitigation
defense.description: Defense reduces incoming damage. The mitigation percentage can be calculated as:
defense.explanation: This means 100 Defense = 50% mitigation, 200 Defense = 66.7% mitigation, and 300 Defense = 75% mitigation.

criticalHits.title: Critical Hits
criticalHits.description: Critical hits deal increased damage and have a chance to occur based on your stats.
criticalHits.chance: Critical chance is calculated from Dexterity and Luck stats

statusEffects.title: Status Effects
statusEffects.description: Status effects can be applied to participants, providing buffs or debuffs.
statusEffects.duration: Effects have a duration (in seconds) and expire after that time
statusEffects.stacking: Most effects stack with each other, but identical effects typically refresh duration instead
statusEffects.expiration: Effects can be removed early by certain skills or when a participant dies

tips.title: Combat Tips
tips.speed: High Speed allows you to act first and potentially eliminate enemies before they attack
tips.defense: Defense is highly valuable - even small increases significantly reduce damage taken
tips.critical: Critical hits are powerful - consider building Dexterity and Luck for critical-focused builds
tips.skills: Use skills strategically - they often deal more damage than basic attacks or provide utility

validation.characterNameMinLength: Character name must be at least 2 characters
validation.characterNameMaxLength: Character name must be 20 characters or less

autoConfig.priorityHintSkills: Skills with lower priority numbers are used first
autoConfig.priorityHintConsumables: Consumables with lower priority numbers are used first
autoConfig.description: Configure automatic skill usage for skills in your skill bar. Skills can be set to use automatically based on combat conditions.
autoConfig.addSkillsHint: Add skills to your skill bar from the Skills tab to configure auto-use.

skillTree.title: Skill Tree
skillTree.noSkillsHint: Skills may still be loading or your class has no skills assigned.
skillTree.adjustFiltersHint: Try adjusting your filters or search terms.
skillTree.respecConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to respec all skills? This will refund all skill points but costs 1000 gold. All learned skills will be removed.

inventory.noSkillsAssigned: No skills assigned to skill bar.
inventory.itemCannotEquipConsumableBar: This item cannot be equipped to the consumable bar.
inventory.onlyCombatConsumables: Only healing potions, mana potions, and buff items can be equipped to the consumable bar.
inventory.consumableBarFull: Consumable bar is full ({{slots}} slots). Remove an item first.
inventory.title: Inventory

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.head: Head
equipment.cannotEquipToSlot: Item cannot be equipped to this slot
equipment.dragToEquip: Drag an item here to equip

itemContextMenu.confirmSell: Are you sure you want to sell {{itemName}}?
itemContextMenu.confirmDrop: Are you sure you want to drop {{itemName}}?

recommendedActions.title: Recommended Actions
recommendedActions.skillPointsDesc: You have {{count}} skill point(s) available. Visit the Skill Tree to learn new abilities.
recommendedActions.equipmentDesc: Check your inventory for items you can equip to improve your stats.
recommendedActions.questsDesc: Visit the Quests panel to see available quests and earn rewards.
recommendedActions.skillsDesc: Use idle skills to gather resources and craft items while you're away.

classChange.warningPreserve: Preserve your level, experience, and idle skills

subclass.unlockInfo: Subclasses unlock at level 50 and require completing a specific quest.
subclass.switchInfo: You can switch between unlocked subclasses freely.

offline.offlineTimeIncreased: Maximum offline time increased by {{hours}} hours! New max: {{newMax}} hours

onboarding.title: Welcome to Tales of Heroes, Legends & Beasts!
onboarding.welcome: Welcome, hero! Your adventure begins now. This guide will help you understand the basics of your journey.
onboarding.tipDescription: You can access this guide and other help information from the Settings panel at any time. Hover over stat names and UI elements to see helpful tooltips!

combat.title: Combat System
combat.description: Combat is turn-based. Select a dungeon and start combat to battle monsters and earn rewards.
combat.step1: Choose a dungeon from the Dungeon Selector
combat.step3: Use skills and consumables during combat to aid your victory

skills.title: Idle Skills
skills.description: Train skills to gather resources, craft items, and gain experience even when offline.
skills.step1: Open the Skills panel to see available skills
skills.step2: Click on a skill to start training
skills.step3: Collect resources and use them to craft items

character.title: Character Progression
character.description: Level up your character, equip better gear, and unlock new abilities.
character.step1: Check your Character panel to see stats and information
character.step2: Visit the Equipment panel to equip better items
character.step3: Use the Skill Tree to learn new combat skills

firstSteps.title: Your First Steps
firstSteps.step1: Select a dungeon and start your first combat
firstSteps.step2: Equip any starter gear from your inventory
firstSteps.step3: Try an idle skill to start gathering resources
